message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly useful for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe $12,000 would be a fair price for us both. Please let me know if we can agree on this.
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? I'm confident this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'm willing to go down to $12,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
